resume_text:
John Doe
Software Engineer

EXPERIENCE
Senior Software Engineer | Tech Corp | 2021-Present
- Developed scalable microservices using Python and FastAPI, reducing response time by 40%
- Led team of 5 engineers in migrating legacy monolith to containerized architecture using Docker and Kubernetes
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
- Designed and optimized PostgreSQL databases, improving query performance by 60%

Software Engineer | StartupXYZ | 2019-2021
- Built RESTful APIs serving 100K+ daily active users
- Collaborated with product team to deliver 15+ features per quarter
- Mentored 3 junior developers on best practices and code review
- Reduced bug count by 35% through comprehensive unit testing with pytest

SKILLS
Languages: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL
Frameworks: FastAPI, React, Node.js, Django
Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Git, PostgreSQL, Redis
Methodologies: Agile, TDD, CI/CD, Microservices

EDUCATION
B.S. Computer Science | University of Technology | 2019
GPA: 3.8/4.0

CERTIFICATIONS
AWS Certified Solutions Architect
Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
job_description: We are seeking a talented Software Engineer to join our team. Responsibilities include developing scalable backend services, working with microservices architecture, and implementing CI/CD pipelines. Required skills: Python, FastAPI, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, AWS. Experience with Agile methodologies and mentoring junior developers is a plus.
